TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlWorkflowPersistenceService extends System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService implements class System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork
Public Class SqlWorkflowPersistenceService Inherits WorkflowPersistenceService Implements IPendingWork
type SqlWorkflowPersistenceService = class inherit WorkflowPersistenceService interface IPendingWork

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 代表使用 SQL 資料庫儲存工作流程狀態資訊的持續性服務。

span.span: Represents a persistence service that uses a SQL database to store workflow state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 類別代表功能完整的持續性服務。The class represents a fully-functional persistence service. 您可以在工作流程執行階段引擎要求時，使用此全新的服務保留和擷取有關工作流程執行個體的工作流程狀態資訊。You can use this service out-of-box to persist and retrieve workflow state information about a workflow instance when requested to by the workflow runtime engine. 會參與 提供的工作流程交易批次功能。The participates in the workflow transaction batching functionality provided by the . 也就是，它會將表示暫停寫入 SQL 資料庫的物件新增至 ，並實作 介面。That is, it adds objects that represent pending writes to the SQL database to the and implements the interface. 支援工作流程執行個體鎖定。The supports locking of workflow instances. 當數個工作流程執行階段共用相同的資料庫時，會使用此功能。This feature is used when several workflow runtimes share the same database. 如果工作流程執行階段正在使用某個工作流程執行個體，SQL 資料庫資料表中會有一個資料行將該工作流程執行個體標示為鎖定。A column in the SQL database table is used to mark a workflow instance as locked whenever it is being used by a workflow runtime. 不會載入標示為由其他執行階段「使用中」的工作流程執行個體。The does not load a workflow instance that is marked as "in use" by another runtime. 一般而言，當工作流程執行個體被保存時 (例如，閒置、完成或終止時)，就會釋放這些鎖定。Typically these locks are released when the workflow instance is persisted, for example, on idle, completion, or termination. 若經過一段時間沒有活動，也可自動釋放鎖定。The locks can also be released automatically after a period of inactivity. 您可使用 類別的建構函式來設定這段無活動的時間間隔，This period of inactivity can be set using the constructor of the class. 亦可使用組態檔來加以設定。It can also be set through the configuration file. 如需持續性服務在一般情況下，請參閱類別。For more information about persistence services in general, see the class. 例如，若工作流程執行個體含有 ，那它可以包含計時器。Workflow instances can contain timers, for example, if they have a . 對於包含計時器的工作流程， 會記錄下一次工作流程計時器過期的時間。For workflows that contain timers, the records the time when the workflow's next timer expires. 會定期輪詢資料庫，尋找計時器已過期的工作流程。The periodically polls the database, looking for workflows whose timers have expired. 使用 建構函式或組態檔，即可設定輪詢間隔的頻率。The frequency of the polling interval can be set using the constructor or using a configuration file. > [!NOTE] > 在工作流程應用程式中使用 和 時，建議您使用單一資料庫進行保存和追蹤。When using both the and the in a workflow application, it is recommended to use a single database for both persistence and tracking.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當工作流程執行階段引擎從應用程式組態檔載入服務時，會叫用此建構函式。This constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file. 亦可採用 `NameValueCollection` 參數，以程式設計方式叫用它。It can also be programmatically invoked with the `NameValueCollection` parameter. 有效參數為 `ConnectionString`、`OwnershipTimeoutSeconds`、`UnloadOnIdle` 和 `EnableRetries`。The valid parameters are `ConnectionString`, `OwnershipTimeoutSeconds`, `UnloadOnIdle`, and `EnableRetries`. 若參數包含任何其他索引鍵，則會擲回 。An is thrown if parameters contain any other keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，若使用此建構函式 (它會提供 `instanceOwnershipDuration` 的值)，就會啟用鎖定。Note that using this constructor (which provides a value for `instanceOwnershipDuration`) enables locking. 若要建立不啟用鎖定的持續性服務，請使用不會指定 `instanceOwnershipDuration` 的不同建構函式。To create a persistence service that does not enable locking, use a different constructor that does not specify `instanceOwnershipDuration`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableRetries { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableRetries : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定 是否要重試認可工作批次。

span.span: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether the retries committing a work batch.

value.span: 如果服務應該重試認可工作批次則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the service should retry committing the work batch; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列工作項目無法批次處理，而且必須透過 `EnableRetries` 屬性處理任何交易重試：The following work items cannot be batched and any transaction retries must be handled through the `EnableRetries` property: - 輪詢有無到期的資料庫計時器。Polling for expired database timers. - 載入工作流程執行個體狀態。Loading workflow instance states. - 當工作流程執行階段引擎啟動時，重新載入工作流程執行個體。Reloading workflow instances when the workflow run-time engine starts. - 呼叫 。Calling . 除了以程式設計方式設定以外，您可以透過組態檔啟用這項功能。Besides being set programmatically, this functionality can be enabled through a configuration file. 如需如何透過組態檔設定這個屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[工作流程組態檔](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909)。For more information about how to set this property through a configuration file, see [Workflow Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909). 如需重試工作批次異動的一般資訊，請參閱[批次處理工作流程中的狀態資訊](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d)。For general information about retrying work batch transactions, see [Batching State Information in Workflows](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `rootActivity` 會序列化並寫入 中。`rootActivity` is serialized and written to the . 全新的 會實作工作流程執行個體狀態的鎖定。The out-of-box implements locking of the workflow instance state. 使用者必須設定建構函式中的 `instanceOwnershipDuration` 參數。The user must configure the `instanceOwnershipDuration` parameter in the constructor. 這個值會決定主機可以鎖定執行個體的時間間隔。This value decides the time interval during which the instance can be locked by a host. 如果多個主機共用相同的持續性服務和資料庫，而另一個主機嘗試在此間隔時間中載入執行個體，則會發生 。If multiple hosts share the same persistence service and database, and another host tries to load the instance during this interval, a occurs. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class.

summary.span: 解除鎖定對指定之工作流程執行個體狀態的存取。

span.span: Unlocks access to the specified workflow instance state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法由工作流程執行階段用來在沒有持續性的資料存放區中解除鎖定工作流程執行個體狀態，並且在執行階段必須解除鎖定沒有持續的狀態時由工作流程執行階段呼叫，例如，在 的情況時。This method is used by the workflow runtime to unlock a workflow instance state in the data store without persistence and is called by the workflow runtime if the runtime must unlock the state without persisting, for example, in the case of an .
